constituent: cosmetics, rice, shire, cave, soil, dirt, ground
koohiiStory1: Condy Rice is actually white, but she uses special cosmetics made from dirt she found in a cave to appear black - it´s better for the political situation.
koohiiStory2: Modern cosmetics are just the descendants of the old RICE flour and CAVE DIRT (´cause it´s darker) used in the past.
myStory: chữ Trang. trang sức. mễ + trang (thôn trang)
